main event: An observer noted a brilliant yellow light moving rapidly across the sky, consistent with a meteor observation.
interesting points: The light appeared elongated and moved extremely fast, taking about 2 seconds to cross the sky,The observation occurred on 12 October 1966 at around 7:30 PM,There was no sound during the sighting,The observer noted that the object disappeared behind treetops,The sighting was reported to the U.S. Air Force through Project Blue Book.
witness description: A 47-year-old woman, who was outdoors and observed the object for about 2 seconds.
